articles.title: Last call on Cyber Monday 2025: Live updates from Amazon, Apple, Best Buy, Walmart, and more - Mashable
articles.description: Get live updates on Cyber Monday sales as we near the closing bell. We found last-chance savings of $1,000 on Samsung TVs and record prices on AirPods.

articles.title: DOJ deciding whether to seek new Comey, James indictments - Politico
articles.description: The department could forgo an appeal of Lindsey Halligan’s disqualification and instead seek to bring new charges against James Comey and Letitia James.

articles.title: ‘Marty Supreme’ Review: Timothée Chalamet and Josh Safdie Reinvent the Sports Comedy in Furiously Energized Study of a Born Hustler - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Gwyneth Paltrow, Odessa A’zion and Tyler, The Creator also star in this odyssey of an aspiring table tennis champion angling to ping pong his way out of 1950s Lower East Side Manhattan.

articles.title: Monday Night Football: Patriots rock Giants, lead 30-7 at halftime - NBC Sports
articles.description: Drake Maye threw for 207 yards and two touchdowns in the first half.

articles.title: Gotham Awards: ‘One Battle After Another’ Takes Best Feature; Three Wins For Jafar Panahi – Full List - Deadline
articles.description: The Gotham Awards, the traditional kickoff to the annual movie awards season, announced winners tonight in NYC.

articles.title: Guest column | How Nick Saban and ESPN tried to help Lane Kiffin coach two teams at once - The Washington Post
articles.description: Kiffin wanted to stay at Mississippi through the College Football Playoff even after taking the job at LSU. That made sense only on television.

articles.title: Apple just named a new AI chief with Google and Microsoft expertise, as John Giannandrea steps down - TechCrunch
articles.description: His replacement is Amar Subramanya, a highly regarded Microsoft executive who spent 16 years at Google, most recently leading engineering for the Gemini Assistant. It's a savvy hire, given that Subramanya knows the competition intimately.

articles.title: How the Trump administration's account of Sept. 2 boat strike has evolved - CBS News
articles.description: The U.S. military's early September strike on an alleged Venezuelan drug boat has drawn new scrutiny as the White House confirmed that the vessel was struck twice.

articles.title: Treasury investigating whether Minnesota welfare money went to Somali terror group al Shabaab, Bessent says - CBS News
articles.description: The Trump administration is looking into whether Minnesota tax money found its way to al Shabaab, an al Qaeda affiliate based in Somalia, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said.

articles.title: Appeals court rules Trump prosecutor appointment violates law - The Washington Post
articles.description: The first appeals court to rule on the issue of interim appointments of U.S. attorneys went against Trump. The ruling could shape other cases nationwide.

articles.title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs’ lawyers send cease-and-desist to Netflix, claim docuseries produced by 50 Cent uses ‘stolen’ footage - CNN
articles.description: On the eve of Netflix releasing a highly anticipated docuseries about Sean “Diddy” Combs — produced by his longtime foe Curtis “50 Cent” Jackson — the embattled mogul’s lawyers have sent a cease-and-desist letter to the streaming giant, demanding it not relea…

articles.title: Sen. Kelly slams Trump, calls for investigation into Caribbean strikes and for Hegseth to testify - ABC News
Steelers Ownership Completely Aware Of Current State Of Mike Tomlin's Team: "Disappointing And Frustrating" - Steeler Nation

articles.title: Stock futures are little changed after major U.S. indexes snap five-day win streaks: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: The slump in cryptocurrencies dragged on during the previous session as bitcoin dropped 6% and recorded its worst day since March.

articles.title: The AirPods Pro 3 Wireless Noise Canceling Earbuds Drops to $149.99 for Cyber Monday - IGN
Donald Trump's MRI test results released by White House doctor - BBC
articles.description: The release comes as Democrats have been pushing to see the results amid concerns about Trump's age.

articles.title: For the first time since 1988, the U.S. is not officially commemorating World AIDS Day - NPR
articles.description: Noting the decision not to mark the day, the State Department stated: "An awareness day is not a strategy." Activists in the fight to end the ongoing AIDS epidemic disagree.
